overview:
John Todd has more than 30 years experience in manufacturing software industry for aerospace customers. Prior to joining Intercim in 1998, John was Vice President, North America for Control Data Systems where he managed operations and business development from the corporate headquarters in Minneapolis.

John’s previous experiences include progressive executive positions in technical consulting, sales and operations with Control Data and Structural Dynamics Research. At Structural Dynamics, John concentrated on PLM solutions for the Aerospace market based in Los Angeles.
